5.eng-name: The Book on the Two Eids
5.ara-name: أَبْوَابُ الْعِيدَيْنِ عَنْ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ

hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Buraidah narrated from his father:"The Prophet would not leave on the Day of Fitr until he ate, and he would not eat on the day of Adha until he prayed

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الأَكْلِ يَوْمَ الْفِطْرِ قَبْلَ الْخُرُوجِ
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been Related] About Eating On The Day Of Fitr Before Going Out
